ggseg.formats 0.0.1

Constructor for brain atlas

Source: R/brain_atlas.R
brain_atlas.Rd

Creates an object of class 'brain_atlas' for plotting brain parcellations using ggseg (2D) and ggseg3d (3D).

Usage

brain_atlas(atlas, type, core, data, palette = NULL)

Arguments

atlas

atlas short name, length one

type

atlas type: "cortical", "subcortical", or "tract"

core

data.frame with required columns hemi, region, label (one row per unique region). May contain additional columns for grouping or metadata (e.g., lobe, network, Brodmann area).

data

a brain_atlas_data object created by one of: cortical_data(), subcortical_data(), or tract_data(). Must match the specified type.

palette

named character vector of colours keyed by label

Value

an object of class 'brain_atlas'

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Cortical atlas
atlas <- brain_atlas(
  atlas = "dk",
  type = "cortical",
  core = core_df,
  data = cortical_data(sf = geometry, vertices = vertex_indices)
)

# Tract atlas
atlas <- brain_atlas(
  atlas = "hcp_tracts",
  type = "tract",
  core = core_df,
  data = tract_data(meshes = tube_meshes, scalars = list(FA = fa_values))
)
} # }
